title: DKR Style Wire Dining Chair
body: The Mobelaris style of DKR Wire Dining Chair shine to stardom in 1951 a result of Charles Eames dedication to creating a light and durable chair with as small quantity of materials as possible. The seat shell of the wire chair resonates with the form of the Eames Plastic Side Chair and mounts on the legendary Eiffel Tower base. Due to a friend’s knowledge with regards to the fundamentals of metal processing is the major influence of this majestic piece. A one-piece seat boasting a light transparency and high trifle.
